thread.title: America Movil plans up to 3 bln pesos in share buybacks

title: America Movil plans up to 3 bln pesos in share buybacks
text: March 21, 2018 / 2:05 AM / a minute ago America Movil plans up to 3 billion pesos in share buybacks Reuters Staff 1 Min Read MEXICO CITY (Reuters) - Mexican billionaire Carlos Slim’s America Movil said on Tuesday it plans to ask shareholders at an April meeting to approve up to 3 billion pesos ($160.56 million) in share buybacks between April 2018 and April 2019. A man takes a picture of the logo of America Movil at the company's corporate offices in Mexico City, Mexico March 14, 2018. REUTERS/Carlos Jasso America Movil will also propose a dividend of 0.30 pesos per share, the company said in a filing with the Mexican stock exchange. Reporting by Daina Beth Solomon; Editing by Sandra Maler
